Title: ASP.Net/MVC Web Site Administration Tool
Description: The Web Site Administration Tool is a simple tool which allows to manage Users, Roles, Profiles of your ASP.Net or ASP.Net MVC application. This is a Silverlight client connected to a set of WCF services which expose Membership, Authorization and Personalization APIs.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Web Site Administration Tool is a simple tool which allows to manage Users, Roles, Profiles of your ASP.Net or ASP.Net MVC application. This is a Silverlight client connected to a set of WCF services which expose Membership, Authorization and Personalization APIs.
